steps.nodeStepDescription: Jump and then press  again while in the air to activate Lift.
An explosive grenade that prevents enemies from using abilities for a short time.
Force Barrier continually recharges.
While inside Ward of Dawn you and your allies gain significant damage resistance.
Reduces the cooldown time of Ward of Dawn.
Increases the benefits granted by Blessing of Light and Weapons of Light.
Heavy Weapon kills have a chance to create Orbs of Light for your allies.
As Ward of Dawn takes damage from enemy fire it creates additional Orbs of Light.
Increases the strength and duration of Force Barrier.
Increases the duration of Ward of Dawn.
Deliver a shattering blow with your most reliable sidearm: your right fist.
Killing an enemy with this powerful melee attack creates a Force Barrier around you which absorbs incoming damage.
While Force Barrier is active all your weapons reload and ready blindingly fast.
Training focused on battle recovery and speed.
Upgrades Lift to carry you higher.
Upgrades Lift to provide a strong initial burst of momentum.
A grenade that attaches to enemies and explodes twice.
A grenade that attaches to any surface and emits a torrent of damaging Void Light.
Passing through Ward of Dawn grants you and your allies a temporary shield.
Passing through Ward of Dawn grants you and your allies a temporary increase to weapon damage.
Shape Void Light into an indestructible shield to protect you and your allies from harm.
Run faster.
Upgrades Lift for better directional control while in the air.
While Force Barrier is active all your melee kills create Orbs of Light.
Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.
Training focused on maximum recovery.
Training focused on speed and toughness.
Training focused on raw speed.
Training focused on all attributes.
